channel.title: North Lancs Greens (Bluesky) on News Lancashire
channel.description: Recent content in North Lancs Greens (Bluesky) on News Lancashire

item.title: #GreenParty has a chance to make a big breakthrough in #GortonAndDenton: door knocking data is very promising. We have a...
item.description: #GreenParty has a chance to make a big breakthrough in #GortonAndDenton: door knocking data is very promising. We have a brilliant local candidate, Hannah Spencer. We are being outspent massively by #Reform and #Labour. Donations can help deliver Hope not Hate.

item.title: Mandelson’s malign influence runs right through the heart of this Government. Not least in the govt’s NHS data deal wit...
item.description: Mandelson’s malign influence runs right through the heart of this Government. Not least in the govt’s NHS data deal with Palantir – a spy-tech firm co-founded by a man who thinks the NHS should be ‘ripped up.’ I’ve written to Wes Streeting urging him to ditch this dangerous deal.

item.title: People are struggling. We need to lower bills, protect our NHS and rebuild our public services. My interview with #BBC...
item.description: People are struggling. We need to lower bills, protect our NHS and rebuild our public services. My interview with #BBCLauraK Great to see Green Party membership rising once again! youtu.be/lMmDM_PvHyc?… Source: North Lancs Greens (Bluesky)

item.title: UHMBT recently announced plans to close 24 patient rehabilitation beds at the Royal Lancaster Infirmary to save money....
item.description: UHMBT recently announced plans to close 24 patient rehabilitation beds at the Royal Lancaster Infirmary to save money. Green County Councillor Hamish Mills, Chair of the Health Scrutiny Committee has ensured that there will now be public consultation. www.bbc.co.uk/news/article… Source: North Lancs Greens (Bluesky)
